main_menu.login_alert: Log in to your account for full access to setiya features
main_menu.authorize_alert: Complete your authentication to complete the registration process

authorize_request.title: Authorize
authorize_request.are_the_displayed_specifications_accepta: Are the displayed specifications acceptable to you?

change_role_dialog.title: Change access level
change_role_dialog.hint: By changing the access level, the restrictions related to the desired access level for this member will be removed
change_role_dialog.same_role_alert: The access level of the target member is the same as the access level you selected

add_members_to_event_bottom_sheet.dialog_hint: If approved, the member will be enrolled regardless of event restrictions
add_members_to_event_bottom_sheet.member_is_registered_in_another_event_in: This mamber is registered in another event in same date

submit_event_attendance.title: QR code scan
submit_event_attendance.hint_one: Press the scan button and enter the QR code in the specified box
submit_event_attendance.hint_two: If scanning is not possible, you can register the presence of the Setiya member in the event with the membership code
submit_event_attendance.hint_three: If the displayed profile is confirmed, the presence of the Setiya member will be recorded in the event

submit_event_entrance_dialog.this_member_is_not_regitered_in_event: This member is not registered for the event

event_participants_list.are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_this_mem: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the event

management_event_details.title: Title

modify_event_form.the_total_number_of_selected_photos_exce: The total number of selected photos exceeds the limit

modify_event_form.start_time_cant_be_empty: The start time cannot be empty
modify_event_form.pictures_hint: For a better display of photos, use images taken in landscape mode
modify_event_form.need_to_acception_hint: If you activate the "need approval" option, all requests to participate in the event must be approved by the manager or vice president of public relations

management_user_profile.reset_password_hint: By resetting the password, from now on, the user must use the registered mobile phone number as the password, the password can be edited later

management_news.are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete: Are you sure you want to delete
management_news.title: News management
management_news.hint_one: Please be careful in choosing the main photo, the photo with a star will be displayed as the main photo of the news on the main page and the news list.
management_news.hint_two: For a better display of photos, use images captured in landscape mode and 16:9 aspect ratio

members_additional_information.title: Additional information
members_additional_information.hint: Completing the information will speed up your progress in Setia

members_event_survey_form.title: Event comment
members_event_survey_form.hint: By registering your feedback, you help Setia to improve the quality of events and you get 5 incentive points

membership_request.title: Authorize request

public_profile.to_access_to_your_profile_complete_autho: Complete your authentication to access your profile and other features
public_profile.dear_user_your_authentication_status_is_: Dear user, your authentication status is under review
